text: Honeymoon () is a 1956 Soviet comedy movie directed by Nadezhda Kosheverova.В Петербурге открылась выставка к столетию Павла КадочниковаМЕДОВЫЙ МЕСЯЦ (1956) It stars Lyudmila Kasatkina, Pavel Kadochnikov, and Tatyana Pankova. == Actors == * Lyudmila Kasatkina as Lyuda Odintsova * Pavel Kadochnikov as Aleksei Rybalchenko * Tatyana Pankova as Anna Terentyevna * Pavel Sukhanov as Ivan Terentevich * Zoya Fyodorova as Elizaveta Povariha * Sergey Filippov as ferryman == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1956 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Nadezhda Kosheverova
title: Honeymoon (1956 movie)
